name: Quest to be King
description:
A mysterious and powerful army known as the Darkness has invaded the land of Thoria and threaten all the good races with extinction. To make matters worse a horde of Undead has also emerged and is spreading plague and death everywhere it goes. It’s up to you to unite the remaining races together and take the fight to your oppressors in this Match 3 RPG game.


KEY FEATURES

- Match 3 gameplay with RPG elements.
- Battle your way though 30+ regions.
- Fight against dragons, undead, darkness and more.
- Purchase buildings, weapons, training and more to make your kingdom stronger.
- Collect daily taxes and tribute to help buy expensive upgrades.
- Never run out of energy or endurance. Play as long as you have gold to spend.
- No in-app purchases!
